references.paper_title: Rt-1: Robotics Transformer for Real-World Control at Scale
references.reason: This paper is a key baseline as it introduces a robotics transformer for real-world control, which Dita is compared against.

references.paper_title: Octo: An Open-Source Generalist Robot Policy
references.reason: This paper is a significant baseline that presents an open-source generalist robot policy, serving as a crucial comparison point for Dita.
This paper is an important baseline, introducing an open-source vision-language-action model that Dita aims to improve upon.

references.paper_title: ManiSkill2: A Unified Benchmark for Generalizable Manipulation Skills
references.reason: This paper introduces the ManiSkill2 benchmark, used by Dita for evaluating generalization across various manipulation tasks.

references.paper_title: Diffusion Policy: Visuomotor Policy Learning via Action Diffusion
references.reason: This paper is crucial as it introduces diffusion policies for visuomotor policy learning, a method that Dita builds upon and extends.
